derivation: middle voice from G4253 (προτίθεμαι) and G5087 (προτίθεμαι);
strongs_def: to place before, i.e. (for oneself) to exhibit; (to oneself) to propose (determine)
outline:
1. to place before, to set forth
    1. to set forth to be looked at, expose to view
    2. to expose to public view
      1. of the bodies of the dead
      2. to let lie in state
    3. to set before one's self, propose to one's self
      1. to purpose, determine
